name: Corporation Management Assistant Program by PHILIBERT Pontacier
name_original: Corporation Management Assistant Program by PHILIBERT Pontacier
description:
"Corporation Management Assistant Program by PHILIBERT Pontacier" is a clicker game based on a trade mecanic!

The objective of the game is to INCREASE the Level of your company to UNLOCK the "ULTIMATE CONTRACT"!
To earn money you can hire employees and send them work, but when they work, they have a chance to see their "Rating" INCREASE or DECREASE.
So you can SELL an employee that has a high "Rating" in exchange of a BIG PRICE!

Be the best trader now... Oh! I think PHILIBERT wants to tell you something!

"GREETINGS, I'm Philibert Pontacier! It's a pleasure to offer you my Corporation Management Assistant Program...
Don't worry if this bad description sounds confusing, i will explain how YOU and ME will develop your business just perfectly later!

I'm glad to be working with you, see you soon!"

I don't agree with that "bad description" thing he said >:(

This is our first game jam, and we're beginners in game developpement, so your feedback will be really appreciated. Don't be worry about telling us what's bad.
Our main inspirations for this game are: "AdVenture Capitalist", "HuniePop", "HunieCam Studio" & "Doki Doki Literature Club!"

Enjoy the game!
